attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the period when Gordon Brown was Chancellor of the Exchequer and now as Prime Minister, the Government has totally disregarded the interests and wishes of the population of this once Great Country and has brought it to its knees.
He has broken promises on a referendum, been involved in, and supported taking us into two wars, causing us to become a terrorists target, has permitted the uncontrolled flood of immigrants, illegal or otherwise, overseen the collapse of the banking industry through lack of effect control. Pumped billions of pounds into Northern rock whilst people go blind or die from lack of treatments being funded and left generations of younger people unable to afford a roof over their heads. 
His total incompetence beggars belief.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
